H0.text: Cuticle is the outer layer of the exoskeleton.

H1.text: Bristle is the outer layer of the exoskeleton.

H2.text: Epidermis is the outer layer of the exoskeleton.

H3.text: Epithelium is the outer layer of the exoskeleton.

A4.text: Examples of exoskeletons in animals include the cuticle skeletons shared by arthropods (insects, chelicerates, myriapods and crustaceans).
